pr_title: Cleanup names in metrics and ensure consistency with specs

timeline.message:
Cleanup names in metrics and ensure consistency with specs

Signed-off-by: Bogdan Drutu <bogdandrutu@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Even though it's a bit longer, I prefer SynchronousInstrument. Also, it would be good to explain in some javadoc what "synchronous" means in this context.
timeline.author: jkwatson
